metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1032 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Kiwix before 0.9.1, when using kiwix-serve, allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the pattern parameter to /search.

criterions.comment: kiwix package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.5-3').
